resources.string: Confused? Don\'t know how to use these arbitrary numbers to express your satisfaction with the product? Use our handy guidebook!

string-array.name: guide_book
string-array.item: 1 - This product made you crave, if ever so slightly, for the sweet release of death
0 - If you could, you would un-birth yourself to avoid this product

string-array.name: rating_toasts
string-array.item: Knowing how beautiful data is, it fills you with determination
Knowing the sun will rise tomorrow yet again, this beautiful consistency fills you with determination
Knowing that Ash finally became a Pokemon master, it fills you with determination
Knowing that determination is all it takes to turn your life around, it fills you with determination
Knowing someone has to sit down and write these for your selfish pleasure, it fills you with determination
Knowing how little your vote influences the statistics in the grand scheme of things, it fills you with an existential crisis
Knowing that one day Pluto may be considered a planet again, it fills you with determination
Knowing your mug of coffee will be filled once more, it fills you with determination
Knowing this too shall pass, it fills you with determination
Your perseverance knows no bounds. You stay determined.
Seeing how consistent your graph looks, it compels you to fill others with determination
Knowing that one day someone may run out of ideas for these, it fills you with terrible dread
